thread.section_title: HiFX New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX New Zealand | www.hifx.co.nz
thread.title: Patricia
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Patricia

author: Patricia
title: Patricia
text:
This was my first time using HiFX New Zealand. I did not know about this service until they were recommend.
We had a good sum to transfer from Australia back home. The rate ended up giving us a lot more than we expected and a considerable more than we would have got with the bank.
It was very easy to use and the staff were super friendly and helpful. We had a few cliches which had nothing to do with HiFX and they even help us with this and made the whole process easy.
Would highly recommend this service.
